column1: The '''Seal of the Stewards'''' was the seal of the [[Stewards of Gondor]]
column2: consisting of the letters R·ND·R below three stars. The letters represent the word [[Arandur]]. This is the actual [[Elvish]] title
column4: that [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] renders into English as 'Steward'.<ref>{{UT|Cirion}}

column3: sent north to [[Eorl]] for aid in his desperate wars
column4: he sent the Seal incised upon a small stone with each of six riders. Only one of these
column6: succeeded in reaching the nation of the [[Éothéod]]
column7: but from this came the famous [[Ride of Eorl]] and the foundation of [[Rohan]].<ref>{{UT|Cirion}}
